qas.question: When do bars close in kenya?

answers.text: Bars in Kenya are permitted to operate until 11pm

qas.question: Do i need a test to internally travel within kenya?

answers.text: You do not need a COVID-19 negative test to board domestic flights within Kenya

paragraphs.context: Proof of COVID-19 vaccination required to access transport, state offices, hotels, bars, restaurants. There are currently no restrictions on travel within Kenya. You do not need a COVID-19 negative test to board domestic flights within Kenya. Bars in Kenya are permitted to operate until 11pm.
